short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension that add comments to netflix

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds a button, next to the full screen button, which opens a panel in which you can comment on the chapter or movie you are watching. It has regions for different languages
